name: MAX
description: Aggregate function that returns the maximum value in a column.

examples.title: Maximum value
examples.sql: SELECT MAX(price) as highest_price FROM products

examples.title: Maximum date
examples.sql: SELECT MAX(updated_at) as last_update FROM users

examples.title: Maximum by group
examples.sql:
SELECT category, MAX(price) as max_price
FROM products
GROUP BY category

notes: Works with numeric, date, and string types
